message: I think I deserve a bit more considering the inflation. How about a 60/40 split in my favor?
Considering the inflation, I'm willing to compromise a bit, but I still think I deserve the bigger share.
The inflation is really starting to work against you, Alice. I'm offering a 55/45 split. Let's be reasonable and close this deal.
I'm still not convinced by your offers, Bob. Inflation or not, I want a fair share.
Alice, this is getting ridiculous.  I'm being more than fair considering the time pressure and the inflation working against you.  525,000 is my final offer. Take it or leave it.
